hint: Allow search with empty or blank string in search box (Default to system property : glide.knowman.allow_empty_search)
name: allow_empty_search
label: Allow Empty Search

hint: Allow search on typeahead (Default to system property : glide.knowman.search.instant_results)
name: allow_instant_search
label: Allow Instant Search On Keypress

hint: Minimum number of characters for search (Default to system property : glide.knowman.search_character_limit)
name: min_search_char
label: Minimum Number of Characters for Search

hint: Wait time between searches, if typeahead search is enabled
name: search_wait
label: Wait time(ms) between searches, if instant search is enabled

hint: Comma separated list of alternate URL parameters for Search input (Default is only query)
name: alt_search_url_params
label: Alternate URL Parameters for Search

hint: Comma separated list of alternate URL parameters for language input (Default is only language)
name: alt_lang_url_params
label: Alternate URL Parameters for Language
